name: algo-project
description: Full-stack online judge platform for competitive programming

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../Compiler && npm install
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd client && npm run lint -- --fix && cd ../server && npm run lint:fix
